entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
